update category set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spell = #{spell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deep = #{deep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leaf = #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, typeName = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE `category_#{name}` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `pid` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `spell` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `deep` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `leaf` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `typeName` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7545 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
